Kaiama bụ ime obodo na obodo dị na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Kwara State, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Kaiama

E kewara mpaghara ọchịchị obodo ahụ ụzọ iri dị ka ndị a: “Kaiama ward 1, Kaiama ward 2, Kaiama ward 3, Kemanji ward, Wojibe ward, ward Gwanabe 1, Gwanabe ward 2, Gwaria ward, Adena ward na Bani ward.”
